page.title: 03Highworth's Ghosts continued
page.content: {The Ghost of Johnny Painter. { ______________________________} A ghost talked about by many people a few years ago was that of {Johnny Painter.}'He who buys the old brickyard buys Johnny Painter.' A saying of the old townspeople of {Highworth.}He haunts{Mr. Archer's}land in{Station Road.}Has he seen him? Yes and no, several shadows have looked like him, and when approached have {disappeared.}Perhaps Johnny was a{shy man in life, which made him a{shy {ghost. {A Mr. Gordon}saw the ghost in {1917.}He was seen wearing a white shirt, corduroy trousers, a waist_coat and a covered hat. {Johnny Painter wasn't murdered, but died a{natural death,}of old age, a few years before{Mr. Gordon}saw him. He is buried in{Highworth Cemetry.
